GitHub

Projects

Oral Cancer Risk Test

A survey app written for the Melbourne University Dental School to assist research into, and prevention of, oral cancer associated with high acetaldhyde levels in the mouth. Consists of REST back-end written in Flask, a web front end written in React, and Android app written in Java. Not publicly visible, but the source can be made available on request.

Pascal Interpreter

A Javascript and React implementation of an interpreter of a subset of Pascal, based on Let's build a simple interpreter. Work in progress.

GitHub - Deployed

Catalog App

A basic CRUD app using Python and the Flask framework, completed for the Udacity full stack course.

GitHub - Deployed

Elm Tetris

Tetris, implemented in Elm.

GitHub - Deployed

Bike Shop Map

A map displaying nearby bike shops, implemented with Javascript & Knockout JS.

GitHub - Deployed

Blog Project

A multi user blog site, allows users to post articles, and comment on and like others articles. Writen in Python for for Google App Engine, using TDD.

GitHub - Deployed

Calorie Tracker

An app for tracking calorie consumption, completed for the Udacity front end course. Implemented in Javascript and Backbone.

GitHub - Deployed

Elm Snake

Snake, in Elm.

GitHub - Deployed
